channel.title: The Hon. Francisco Canseco
channel.description: The Hon. Francisco Canseco U.S. Representative (TX-23) (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: My name is Francisco Canseco. I represent the 23rd Congressional District of Texas.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: Mitt Romney and I share a simple belief.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: We owe our children a better future.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: We owe them a future without high unemployment, higher taxes and a crushing burden of debt.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: Along the nearly 800 miles of US-Mexico border that I serve, farmers, small businesses and families are striving to live the American dream.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: Whether you are a seventh generation American or a first generation immigrant, like my parents were, coming to seek a better life, we all want the opportunity to succeed.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: Unfortunately, Barack Obama is burdening us with destructive debt, punishing taxes, and robbing us of that opportunity to succeed.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: We can ensure our children have a brighter future if we follow this guidance.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: Un gobierno limitado y menos impuestos significan más oportunidad y mejores empleos para un futuro más próspero para las siguientes generaciones. Con Mitt Romney como Presidente - lo podemos hacer mejor.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco

item.title: Lower taxes and less government means more opportunity and better job creation for a brighter future for generations to come. We can do better with Mitt Romney as President.
item.author: The Hon. Francisco Canseco
